channel.description: Recent content in firefox on Matt Jarvis

item.title: Firefox Extension: Github Gists
item.description: I store snippets of code with Github Gists to remind myself how to do things that I don’t do regularly enough to remember off hand. At first it was only a few, but my list is growing and as it grows it becomes harder to find the one I want. I’ve made myself a little Firefox extension to list all my Gists with a search field so I can quickly locate them.
